pronunciation.pinyin: wú yán jiàn jiāng dōng fù lǎo
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: wu2 yan2 jian4 Jiang1 dong1 fu4 lao3

meanings.value: to be unable to return to one's hometown due to the shame of failure (originally referred to Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3], who chose not to retreat to Jiangdong after his humiliating defeat)
